TitleEnglish: Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider
SummaryEnglish: Even after turning 40 years old, Tojima Tanzaburo still seriously wants to be a Kamen Rider. Just when it seems like his dream may never come true, he gets caught up in a series of infamous Shocker-inspired robberies... Shibata Yokusaru, the author of Air Master and 81 Diver, presents a story about adults who love Kamen Rider a little too much, and start playing pretend... for real!
Aliases: Tōjima Tanzaburō wa Kamen Rider ni Naritai
Toujima Tanzaburou wa Kamen Rider ni Naritai
Tojima Tanzaburo Wants to Be a Masked Rider
Tojima Tanzaburo Wants to Be a Kamen Rider

1.TitleEnglish: Tojima Wants to Be a Kamen Rider
1.SummaryEnglish: Tanzaburo Tojima has always idolized Kamen Rider, to the point of wanting to be him. He turns 40 this year...

2.SummaryEnglish: Yukiro Okada, a longtime fan of Electro-Wave Human Tackle, has been training every day to become Tackle while working as a high school teacher.

3.TitleEnglish: I Love The Moment When Hate Turns To Love
3.SummaryEnglish: After their encounter with the real Shocker, Tojima meets someone who knows more about the evil organization.
